p: The virus is transmitted by female mosquitoes mainly by the species Ae. aegypti and, to a lesser extent, by Ae. albopictus. However, the published findings of the disease outbreaks showed that the virus was spread mostly through Ae. albopictus in China, especially in Guangdong Province [ 2, 6]. The outbreak in Ningbo City revealed that the virus is expanding its transmission area through Ae. albopictus in China, and that it is an urgent issue to look insight of the transmissibility of the vector and to assess the vector specific countermeasures for disease control and prevention.
